languages.text: "Выше нос, торговка. Испытания закаляют — может, этот мир выбьет из тебя порок-другой".
languages.translation_comment:
On the frozen world with the Drukhari turret trap.
Jae: "Want to know what I'm thinking about? I'm thinking about being in my nice, heated cabin. With a glass of something warm. And somebody warm pressed up against me..."

traits.locale_text: "Выше нос, торговка. Испытания закаляют — может, этот мир выбьет из тебя порок-другой".

languages.text: "Chin up, peddler. Trials make us stronger — this world might just beat a few vices out of you."
languages.translation_comment:
On the frozen world with the Drukhari turret trap.
Jae: "Want to know what I'm thinking about? I'm thinking about being in my nice, heated cabin. With a glass of something warm. And somebody warm pressed up against me..."
languages.original_text: "Выше нос, торговка. Испытания закаляют — может, этот мир выбьет из тебя порок-другой".

traits.locale_text: "Chin up, peddler. Trials make us stronger — this world might just beat a few vices out of you."
"Chin up, peddler. Trials make us stronger — this world might just beat a few vices out of you."
"Chin up, peddler. Trials make us stronger — this world might just beat a few vices out of you."
"Chin up, peddler. Trials make us stronger — this world might just beat a few vices out of you."
"Chin up, peddler. Trials make us stronger — this world might just beat a few vices out of you."
"Chin up, peddler. Trials make us stronger — this world might just beat a few vices out of you."

languages.text: 「元気を出せ、行商人。試練は人を強くする。この惑星が、お前の悪い癖をいくつか叩き直してくれるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "Chin up, peddler. Trials make us stronger — this world might just beat a few vices out of you."

traits.locale_text: 「元気を出せ、行商人。試練は人を強くする。この惑星が、お前の悪い癖をいくつか叩き直してくれるかもしれない」

languages.text: "Kopf hoch, Schmugglerin. Prüfungen stärken uns nur. Diese Welt könnte noch das eine oder andere Laster aus Euch herausprügeln."
languages.original_text: "Chin up, peddler. Trials make us stronger — this world might just beat a few vices out of you."

traits.locale_text: "Kopf hoch, Schmugglerin. Prüfungen stärken uns nur. Diese Welt könnte noch das eine oder andere Laster aus Euch herausprügeln."

languages.text: « Du nerf, colporteuse. Les épreuves nous rendent plus forts. Ce monde pourrait bien vous faire passer un ou deux vices. »
languages.original_text: "Chin up, peddler. Trials make us stronger — this world might just beat a few vices out of you."

traits.locale_text: « Du nerf, colporteuse. Les épreuves nous rendent plus forts. Ce monde pourrait bien vous faire passer un ou deux vices. »

languages.text: «Anímese, buhonera. Las ordalías nos fortalecen; a lo mejor este mundo le depura un par de vicios».
languages.original_text: "Chin up, peddler. Trials make us stronger — this world might just beat a few vices out of you."

traits.locale_text: «Anímese, buhonera. Las ordalías nos fortalecen; a lo mejor este mundo le depura un par de vicios».

languages.text: “打起精神来，小贩。考验会让我们变得更坚强，这个世界只会帮助你消灭恶习。”
languages.original_text: "Chin up, peddler. Trials make us stronger — this world might just beat a few vices out of you."

traits.locale_text: “打起精神来，小贩。考验会让我们变得更坚强，这个世界只会帮助你消灭恶习。”

languages.text: "Enseyi karartma. Duruşmalar bizi güçlendirir. Belki bu dünya seni biraz yola getirir."
languages.original_text: "Chin up, peddler. Trials make us stronger — this world might just beat a few vices out of you."

traits.locale_text: "Enseyi karartma. Duruşmalar bizi güçlendirir. Belki bu dünya seni biraz yola getirir."
